products.title: Amor Ocean Green Vertical Blind
products.metadescription: Amor Ocean Green Vertical Blind
products.productdescription: Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains.  This blind can be made upto 400cm wide - much wider than all other blinds on the market so that you can cover your largest window without comprimising on style. All of our blinds are sold with built-in child safety mechanisms. We adhere to the guidelines set out by the British Blind and Shutter Association and take safety extremely seriously. All blinds come with the relevant child safety instructions and warnings. Please ensure you follow the provided instructions and warnings carefully. Please visit www.makeitsafe.org.uk to find out more. All control chains supplied with our vertical blinds will be approximately half the length of the drop. If you require a longer control chain, please get in touch once ordered and we can amend this for you.

products.title: Burst Ocean Green Vertical Blind
products.metadescription: Burst Ocean Green Vertical Blind
products.productdescription: Say Aloha to this beautiful emerald blind that is even better than bobbing in a turquoise green ocean. Can a remote chain of tropical islands stop people from looking into your window? Could a the ocean, No? Well this beautiful fabric can do that with ease, and while it does so it floods the room in a beautiful greeny-teal glow that bathes the soul like the warm waters of the pacific. Combining it with other earthy colours is a sure-fire way of creating a space which heals and relaxes before you return to the stresses and distractions of real life.  Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains.  This blind can be made upto 400cm wide - much wider than all other blinds on the market so that you can cover your largest window without comprimising on style.

products.title: Splash Vine Green 89mm Vertical Blind
products.metadescription: Splash Vine Green 89mm Vertical Blind in Green. Made to measure from £9.70 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This 89mm Vertical Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Breathe life into your living space with this Splash Vine Green vertical blind. Vertical blinds add a stylish, modern look and this light-filtering, dim-out vertical blind is the perfect choice whether you are refreshing a tired looking window or moving into a new home. As a simple plain fabric, this green vertical blind is one of our favourites - especially for adding a splash of colour in kitchens, as this fabric is also moisture-resistant!Coming with sleek white components and quality-checked by our blind experts, quality is paramount.  At Swift Direct Blinds with over 50 years making and selling blinds under our belt, not only is this vertical blind made by the experts,  it also comes with a fabulous five year guarantee - extra assurance that you are investing in quality that will stand the test of time.

products.title: Bella Blackout Vine Green 89mm Vertical Blind
products.metadescription: Bella Blackout Vine Green 89mm Vertical Blind in Green. Made to measure from £14.14 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This 89mm Vertical Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
This luscious Bella Blackout Vine Green vertical blind brings cooling splash of green to your room.  This blind reduces light through its blackout properties, making this quality made to measure vertical blind a perfect addition to any room that needs optimum light control. Whether its fully closed, binge-watching the latest riveting TV drama, or letting the light in (but keeping your privacy), our vertical blinds are great for privacy for bedroom, living room or office!  A complentary shade to either side of the spectrum, whether adding in more to your cool-toned green/blue/grey theme or cooling down a warm room, this green vertical blind signifies vitality and growth in this succulent shade.Our best-selling Bella Blackout range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish and colour-match blackout backing, perfect for adding style inside and outside your home!At Swift Direct Blinds, we take quality seriously. Not only are we situated in the heart of the Yorkshire textile industry, but our own company is also seeped with a rich history, with over 50 years experience making blinds and curtains for home up and down the country. This gorgeous green vertical blind not only comes with a fabulous 5 year guarantee, for extra peace of mind, but is made by our blind specialists and comes with caring customer-first service. Still not sure? Why not check out our industry-leading SizeSure measuring-insurance, or if really in rush browse our SwiftTrack blinds, for delivery next day!
